description: the table lists public drinking water fountains in the district Steglitz-Zehlendorf or Berlin. Each row represents one drinking water fountain.

columns.name: Nr
columns.description: irrelevant, a number used to organize the data

columns.name: Name
columns.description: name of the drinking water fountain, it may refer to a well-known place

columns.name: Strasse
columns.description: the street where the drinking water fountain is located

columns.name: Hausnummer
columns.description: the house number the drinking water fountains location or street address

columns.name: PLZ
columns.description: the postal code of the drinking water fountains location or street address

columns.name: Ort
columns.description: irrelevant, the location is Berlin in all cases

description: the table lists bike thefts in the years 2024 and 2025. Each row represents one bike theft event

columns.name: TATZEIT_ANFANG_DATUM
columns.description: begin of the time span where the theft happened

columns.name: TATZEIT_ANFANG_STUNDE
columns.description: hour at the begin of the time span where the theft happened

columns.name: TATZEIT_ENDE_DATUM
columns.description: end of the time span where the theft happened

columns.name: TATZEIT_ENDE_STUNDE
columns.description: hour at the end of the time span where the theft happened
